ReferenceDocuments.name: What is/was the category of t
ReferenceDocuments.description: What is/was the category of the substance (used)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the Substance Used category, if not pre-printed on the CRF.

ReferenceDocuments.name: SUCAT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Sponsor-defined Controlled Terminology (e.g., TOBACCO, ALCOHOL, CAFFEINE). Sponsors may require different types of substance use data (e.g., illicit drug use, cigarettes, etc.); the value for category may be pre-printed on the CRF. If a more detailed type of substance appears on the CRF (e.g., CIGARETTES, CIGARS, rather than TOBACCO), SUCAT is TOBACCO and SUTRT is CIGARETTES. If the sponsor does not specify a type of tobacco on the CRF, SUTRT is TOBACCO. If SUCAT is not collected (e.g. it is self-evident from the protocol design), it could be populated during the SDTM-based dataset creation process.

DataElement.changeDescription: 2021-6-10 ak Released per governance approval. 2/20/20 tmt transferred ownership from NRDS to NCI Standards/BMaeske and restored CSIs. 11-26-19 tmt removed NCI CSI, associated with NRDS CSI and changed Registration Status. 11-25-19 tmt transferred ownership from NCI Standards to NRDS/BMaeske. Created as part of the CDISC mapping task_ghd_08.24.18
